description:
Timeless style in full effect with this thick fleece vest. Patagonia’s Classic Retro-X vest uses modern bonded fleece to block wind and add warmth.High-pile Sherpa fleece bonded to a windproof backing.Recycled blend.HeiQ® Fresh durable odour control.Zippered chest and hand pockets keep EDC gear close and safe.High collar blocks wind.Regular fit.

        Sustainability

name: Patagonia Classic Retro-X Vest - Men's
